channel.title: Eating bug
channel.description:
Can anyone help me with this, i sometimes (well mostly) i cant eat on my server (testscape). i searched for a solution for this but i couldnt find one and i dont want to keep using a command to heal myself. ive only tryed to eat sharks so i dont know about any other foods.
any help would be greatly appreciated :)

item.title: Eating bug
item.dc:creator: @jammesz jammesz
item.description:
@jammesz wrote:

thx for the advice but weni search for “healingTimer =” it come up first with public int healingTimer = 0;
so healingTimer = 0 by default but then i search again it comes up with this:

public boolean healing() {
		if (healingTimer == 0 && healing[0] == 1 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] >= 0) {
			//actionAmount++;
			healingTimer = 4;
			OriginalShield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
			OriginalWeapon = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
			playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
			playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1;
			setAnimation(0x33D);
			healing[0] = 2;
                        //actionTimer = 0;
		}
		if (healingTimer == 0 && healing[0] == 2) {
			deleteItem(healing[4], GetItemSlot(healing[4]), 1);
			int Heal = healing[1];
			int HealDiff = (healing[2] - healing[1]);
			if (HealDiff > 0) {
				Heal += misc.random(HealDiff);
			}
			if (healing[3] != -1) {
				addItem(healing[3], 1);
			}
			NewHP = (playerLevel[playerHitpoints] + Heal);
			if (NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])) {
				NewHP = 99;
			}
			sendMessage("You eat the "+GetItemName(healing[4])+".");
			playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = OriginalWeapon;
			playerEquipment[playerShield] = OriginalShield;
			OriginalWeapon = -1;
			OriginalShield = -1;
                        //actionTimer = 4;
			resetAnimation();
                        updateRequired = true;
			resetHE();
		}

so… what should i do because it says that healingTimer needs to equal 0 to heal.

if im wrong about this please excuse me as im a newbie at java scripting but its also easy for me as i have experience with other programming languages.

Read full topic

item.title: Eating bug
item.dc:creator: @Slyte Slyte
item.description:
@Slyte wrote:

Hmm search for this:

healingTimer =

Make sure the number isnt 0 or isnt alot. If so itll make it take forever[br][size=1]Posted at: December 19, 2006, 06:59:11 AM[/size][hr]Oh search that in client.java btw[br][size=1]Posted at: December 19, 2006, 07:02:45 AM[/size][hr]Hey lets say you wield a whip, then you eat like 10 sharks within 10 seconds. Then to eat, you are having to eat again? If so, do that tut i told you to do, and your problem is fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Eating bug
item.dc:creator: @jammesz jammesz
item.description:
@jammesz wrote:

That tut is for people whos weapons or equipment are disappearing. mine is about when i, say, click on a shark it doesnt heal me and just stays in my inventitory.

but i also saw that it modifies the healing() function so just to make sure…
Are you definitly sure that this will solve my problem or have you just mistakenly misread my post?
Thx for the help though

Read full topic

item.title: Eating bug
item.dc:creator: @jammesz jammesz
item.description:
@jammesz wrote:

nahh i was, i had whip. there are many things that can by chance allow me to eat, the one i once used was loggin out, close moparscape and open moparscape, log back in and that allowed me to eat. but that never worked again for me. also sometime i would equip things or do sumthin and it would then allow me to eat. i think this is a real bug that needs to be fixed.

Read full topic
